experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.description:
- Delivered web applications utilizing HTML/CSS/JavaScript (ES6+), or React.js/Typescript/TailwindCSS, ensuring optimal performance and user experience.
- Development of SEO-optimized landing pages, blogs and e-commerce websites, leading to increased traffic and customer engagement.
- Implementation of redesign for a financial services application using React.js, enhancing UI/UX and user engagement and satisfaction based on A/B testing results.
- Integration of RESTful APIs into React.js applications, ensuring efficient data flows and correct communication between frontend and backend services.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description:
- Collaboration with audit professionals to develop features for an AI-based financial auditing system, leveraging Python, React, Bootstrap, AWS, OpenAI, etc., to be powerful and efficient.
- Implementation of two-factor authentication (2FA), RAG Model to chat with uploaded attachments, automatized extraction and analysis of company documents, searching of critical details about a company, and several other functionalities.
- Provisioning of AI-based insights to auditors for them to decide the next steps or answers to each stage of the audit process of a company's financial state.
- Development of bespoke app to automate code reviews for internal projects using GPT-4o API, improving adherence to coding standards and reducing review and refactoring time by 50%.
- Employment of Jenkins/Docker for CI/CD, ensuring scalability and portability across environments.
